changelog.fix: ALL OPTIONS OF 2.1.15 (except H2V support), BUT WITH THE STABILITY OF 2.1.14
changelog.add: Added right-click option to set active SCNR tag (after duplicating)
changelog.fix: Fixed: Floodfill swap changes incorrect values after sorting
changelog.add: All panels can now be docked/undocked (References, ME1/2, Hex, Bitmap Viewer)
Added option to sort reflexives by offset
changelog.fix: Fixed: Internal memory list not being cleared when "Hide/Unhide unused reflexives" clicked
Fixed: Mouse out of tag tree control doesn't always close side panel
Fixed: Collision boxes all red, now changed shader back to see-through
